attributes.action: non British NHS workers should get citizenship for working during COVID-19!!
attributes.additional_details: Non British NHS workers make up 12% of the NHS work force and should be awarded British citizenship for Thier dedication during this pandemic! https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/populationandmigration/internationalmigration/articles/internationalmigrationandthehealthcareworkforce/2019-08-15#:~:text=Non-British%20nationals%20make%20up%2012%25%20of%20the%20UK%20healthcare,6%25%20non-EU%20nationals. where would we be without the cleaners, nurses, doctors etc during this pandemic ?
attributes.background: Non British NHS workers should be awarded British citizenship for Thier work during the covid-19 pandemic!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564829
